To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private SimpleMovingAverage _sma;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_sma = SMA(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_sma.IsReady)
{
    var rollingSum = _sma.RollingSum.Value;
    var period = _sma.Period.Value;
    var current = _sma.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.sma = self.SMA(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.sma.IsReady:
    rolling_sum = self.sma.RollingSum.Value
    period = self.sma.Period.Value
    current = self.sma.Current.Value
